entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 11. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
